title: cmd/gc: tempname called with nil type
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

http://play.golang.org/p/Tn13z7jlHc

What is the expected output?

The program successfully compiles.

What do you see instead?

./main.go:4: unknown other.Foo field 'other.error' in struct literal
./main.go:16: tempname called with nil type

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

Darwin

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go version go1.1.2 darwin/amd64
